name: phone-server
description: server of the phone book project

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd "~/Downloads/PKF 48 docs/doc 1/web dev/React/phone book/" && npm run build && cp -r dist "~/Downloads/PKF 48 docs/doc 1/web dev/React/phone server/"
